title: How to Catch Dialga and Palkia in Pok√©mon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire

steps.title: Get the Eon Flute.
steps.content: Get the Eon Flute. You get the Eon Flute after completing the Primal Groudon/Kyogre storyline at Sootopolis City.

steps.title: Place Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf into your party.
steps.content: Place Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf into your party. This is required for Dialga/Palkia to appear.

steps.title: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.
steps.content: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.

steps.title: Near Dewford City, look for a tear in the sky.
steps.content: Near Dewford City, look for a tear in the sky. Interact with the tear to encounter Palkia in Omega Ruby and Dialga in Alpha Sapphire.
